data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Chandauli to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chandauli, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,907,625 lost people in  Chandauli, Uttar Pradesh, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,952,800 citizens of Chandauli, Uttar Pradesh, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Chandauli, Uttar Pradesh, India to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Rajput Amethiya people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Rajput Amethiya people.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Chandauli, Uttar Pradesh, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Chandauli.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Chandauli, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 1,952,800.

We estimate Chandauli has 21,481 people who might know Jesus, 23,694 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,907,625 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Chandauli.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
